-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Please see the README on GitHub at
--   <a>https://github.com/snowmang1/Fast-Weight-Programmer#readme</a>
@package fwp
@version 0.1.0.0

module Lib
someFunc :: IO ()

-- | <a>setBoard</a> Initializes the Board
setBoard :: Matrix Board

-- | <a>setWeights</a> analyses the state of the current Board and adjusts
--   the weights accordingly
setWeights :: Matrix Board -> Matrix Weights

-- | 'mapMat is a map transform over any <a>Matrix</a> a that exposes the
--   row,column # to f where the function exposes (row -&gt; column -&gt;
--   <a>Matrix</a> a -&gt; b) <a>mapMat</a> will currently only take square
--   matrices
mapMat :: Matrix a -> (Int -> Int -> Matrix a -> b) -> Matrix b
data Player
White :: Player
Red :: Player
data Board
Piece :: Player -> Board
Empty :: Board
instance GHC.Show.Show Lib.Player
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Lib.Player
instance GHC.Show.Show Lib.Board
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Lib.Board
